name: Ayame (marisa0704)
description:
Little Slime    wants to play with you right on your screen. However, his visit attracts some glitches   and viruses   that potentially harm your computer. Quick, solve the problem by pushing all the disks  to all the spots  (?). By that, all the glitches and viruses will be erased.

Note:
  • Arrow keys to control, key R to replay the current level, key M to mute background music, key ESC to quit. 
  • You will see the background is transparent, don't worry about it! It's because I want my game be free, and the resolution is still 64x64.
  • Control the slime to jump on this symbol   to move to next level.
  • At some levels there are viruses that are able to kick your disks out of the spots. About that, push these blocks   on their ways to stop them OR you can find a way to use those viruses to help you finish the level.
Important:
  • This may be a Sokoban-like game but do not play it as Sokoban. Do ANYTHING YOU CAN IMAGINE to beat the game.
  • There will be a file named "6-digit codes" appear in your disk D://. After finishing each level, there will a 6-digit code generate there. Collect all 10 codes to completely beat the game. ALSO, SINCE THEY ARE ALL 6-DIGIT CODES, IF YOU ARE A MAN OF CULTURE, I'M SURE YOU WILL KNOW HOW TO USE THEM ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)   .
  • The background music is "Slime Time" by AdhesiveWombat. Check out this man, he make many cool soundtracks for video games.
